titleStmt.title: Sustainable Authorship in Plain Text using Pandoc and Markdown

sourceDesc.p: Born digital, in a markdown format. This lesson is original. Available translations are the following:

abstract.p: In this tutorial, you will first learn the basics of Markdown—an easy to read and write markup syntax for plain text—as well as Pandoc, a command line tool that converts plain text into a number of beautifully formatted file types: PDF, .docx, HTML, LaTeX, slide decks, and more.
